attributes.action: Reduce the Mayor of London's average 30% rise of Residents Parking Permits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have just received our Resident's Parking Permit renewal, and am disgusted to see an approx 30% rise in costs. Mayor Livingstone might get a 30% pay rise but we are lucky to get 3%. Residents are being priced out of being able to park outside their own homes and this is just not fair. Residents permits should be capped at no more than £40. With the increase of front drive parking, it is more difficult than ever to find a space in the street, even more so outside your own home.
